about_the_game:
Demonstrating persistence and skill in battle will allow you to research any ship branch without the requirement of financial investment. However, you can purchase special in-game currency—doubloons—which can ease your progress along the Tech Tree. Doubloons can make playing the game even more enjoyable and help you reach your goals much faster.

This pack includes:
  • 2 500 Doubloons
  • 1x Steam permanent camouflage: unique Steam-exclusive design!
  • 9x common expendable economic bonuses of four types (Credits +20%, Ship XP +100%, Commander XP +100%, and Free XP +300%)

Camouflages only change the ship exterior and do not provide any economic or combat bonuses.

The content of this DLC is only playable on World of Warships accounts created via Steam and will be invoiced on your Wargaming Account only once.

Demonstrating persistence and skill in battle will allow you to research any ship branch without the requirement of financial investment. However, you can purchase special in-game currency—doubloons—which can ease your progress along the Tech Tree. Doubloons can make playing the game even more enjoyable and help you reach your goals much faster.

This pack includes:

  • 1x Steam permanent camouflage: unique Steam-exclusive design!
  • 9x common expendable economic bonuses of four types (Credits +20%, Ship XP +100%, Commander XP +100%, and Free XP +300%)

Camouflages only change the ship exterior and do not provide any economic or combat bonuses.

The content of this DLC is only playable on World of Warships accounts created via Steam and will be invoiced on your Wargaming Account only once.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 x64 SP1
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.66 GHz, Core i3 2.5 GHz, AMD Athlon II X2 2.7 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 440/630, AMD Radeon HD 7660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 62 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11
  • Additional Notes: 1280×720
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 x64 SP1 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.4 GHz, AMD FX 6350 3.9 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660, AMD Radeon R9 270x
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 65 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11.1
  • Additional Notes: 1920×1080

esrb.descriptors:
Violence
• Mostly realistic setting
• Photo-realistic depiction

Violence Against Non-Humans
• Violence is often depicted from a distance
• Violence is rarely depicted close-up
• No blood and gore

Language
• Minor profanities (e.g. "damn"; "hell")
